mapper.insert: insert into picture(car_num, member_id, picture_1, picture_2, picture_3, picture_4, picture_5, picture_6, picture_7, picture_8, picture_9, picture_10, picture_11, picture_12, picture_13, picture_14, picture_15, picture_16, picture_17, picture_18, picture_19, picture_20) values(#{carNum}, #{memberId}, #{picture1}, #{picture2}, #{picture3}, #{picture4}, #{picture5}, #{picture6}, #{picture7}, #{picture8}, #{picture9}, #{picture10}, #{picture11}, #{picture12}, #{picture13}, #{picture14}, #{picture15}, #{picture16}, #{picture17}, #{picture18}, #{picture19}, #{picture20})
